snippet.title: My hero Colorful FOR GOOGLE PLAY - My Hero Studio FREE GAME ANDROID
snippet.description:
DOWNLOAD GOOGLE PLAY: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.justhavefun.gravity


Colorful hero with a crazy gravity?

Go on that impossible mission with these colorful titans heroes.
My Hero Colorful, is the best casual arcade game to kill your free time.

Escape from the Towers, with its colorful hero, altering gravity in this incredible Flat Universe.

One tip: You can change gravity whenever you want, causing your hero to go up or down.

Have fun in this incredible game where the "normal" does not exist. Earn more and more points, bypassing the towers, to unlock several and multiple heroes.

There are several types of colorful heroes in this game.

Play in 3 amazing different scenarios that feature an attractive Flat design and heroes of various colors and styles.

Unlock all heroes for more dynamic gameplay.

Share the game with your friends via Facebook and have fun with them by beating the score and managing to be the best in the game with your favorite colored hero.

Now with Google Play Service it's easier to know where you stand in the game rankings.


Characteristics:
- Simple gameplay
- Various colorful unlockable heroes
- including 2 heroes with animations
- Free Game
- Light play
- An explosion of colors


Share on Facebook if you like the game.
Do not forget to rate.

About the Game:
It is an indie game developed by D. Linhares in the Unity 3D tool.
The design used was the Flat developed through Photoshop.

Embark on this Impossible Mission with several colorful heroes.

Do not waste time and take your colored hero wherever you go.
"No matter where you go,
always have someone or something
on your way."
